title: My big fat tipsy trifle
description: This trifle is a real showstopper and so very simple to make – ready from start to finish in about 30–40 minutes. Equipment and preparation: You'll need a large trifle dish or glass bowl.
ingredients: 150ml/5fl oz amaretto (or any strong liqueur), plus extra for flambéeing
800g/1lb 12oz strawberries, hulled, cut in half lengthways
